Title: Resource virtualization and universal routing architecture for heterogeneous optical networks
Source: ICOCN - Int. Conf. Opt. Commun. Networks, Proc.
Abstract: © 2015 IEEE.We propose a resource virtualization solution and realize universal routing in heterogeneous optical networks supporting various transmission mechanisms including SDH, OTN, WDM, EON, SDM, etc. Our architecture achieves significantly better blocking performance and resource utilization.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
